entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kaladar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:12 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 12:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -4

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
